comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: These gentlemen are repairing a flat tire.  That's the inner tube that they are holding.  You can see that the tire is off the rim. It was the  custom to carry patches, an air pump, and a jack, plus one or more spare tires. The natural rubber tires used in those days were not very reliable.  Roadways were nothing to brag about either.
